info.title: c.scale™
info.summary: This is the API documentation for EHDD's c.scale™ model.
info.description:
c.scale is a stateless API for calculating whole carbon footprints from buildings. c.scale has the ability to calculate embodied, operational, and landscape emissions at various levels of resolution. A description of c.scale's methodology for calculating carbon emissions is available in our [documentation](https://docs.cscale.io).

For additional test sets and the API workbook, please click [here](https://drive.google.com/drive/u/2/folders/1Q__pMVDnPgzv01aWb-cfakifKtuqyH4K).

schema.title: Response Calculate Time Series Data Api Timeseries Post

year_completion.title: Year Completion
year_completion.description: Year of substantial completion; start of calculation.

year_completion.title: Year Completion
year_completion.description: Year of substantial completion; start of calculation.

above_floor_sqf.title: Above Floor Sqf
above_floor_sqf.description: Average area per floor above grade.

above_floors.title: Above Floors
above_floors.description: Number of floors above grade. Model performance over 60 floors is not validated.

below_floor_sqf.title: Below Floor Sqf
below_floor_sqf.description: Average area per floor below grade.

window_to_wall_ratio.title: Window To Wall Ratio
window_to_wall_ratio.description: Proportion of glazing to total vertical envelope.

perimeter.title: Perimeter
perimeter.description: Average lineal distance around the exterior(s) of the building.

percent_floor_area_interior_fitout.title: Percent Floor Area Interior Fitout
percent_floor_area_interior_fitout.description: Percentage of the building GFA used in interior fitout calculation.

percent_conditioned_area.title: Percent Conditioned Area
percent_conditioned_area.description: Percentage of the building GFA used in MEP and energy calculations.

planted_area.title: Planted Area
planted_area.description: Area planted on site. Cannot exceed the difference between site area and building footprint.

site_area.title: Site Area
site_area.description: Total site area, including the building footprint.

additional_planting_area.title: Additional Planting Area
additional_planting_area.description: Planting area on and beyond the site. This parameter is not constrained by site area.

reduced_building_area.title: Reduced Building Area
reduced_building_area.description: Reduction in building area. Large inputs can yield unrealistic results, as building geometry is not included in this calculation.

building_structure_reuse.title: Building Structure Reuse
building_structure_reuse.description: Percentage reuse of existing structural system.

cladding_reuse.title: Cladding Reuse
cladding_reuse.description: Percentage reuse of existing opaque envelope.

glazing_reuse.title: Glazing Reuse
glazing_reuse.description: Percentage reuse of existing transparent envelope.

roofing_reuse.title: Roofing Reuse
roofing_reuse.description: Percentage reuse of existing roofing assembly.

interior_fitout_reuse.title: Interior Fitout Reuse
interior_fitout_reuse.description: Percentage reuse of existing interior fitout.

mep_reuse.title: Mep Reuse
mep_reuse.description: Percentage reuse of existing MEP systems.

ref_specification.title: Ref Specification
ref_specification.description: 20th (Low Carbon), 50th (Best Practices), and 80th (Conservative) percentile of carbon intensities for this category.

A4_A5_specification.title: A4 A5 Specification
A4_A5_specification.description: 20th (Low Carbon), 50th (Best Practices), and 80th (Conservative) percentile of carbon intensities for this category.

concrete_specification.title: Concrete Specification
concrete_specification.description: 20th (Low Carbon), 50th (Best Practices), and 80th (Conservative) percentile of carbon intensities for this category.

steel_specification.title: Steel Specification
steel_specification.description: 20th (Low Carbon), 50th (Best Practices), and 80th (Conservative) percentile of carbon intensities for this category.

timber_specification.title: Timber Specification
timber_specification.description: 20th (Low Carbon), 50th (Best Practices), and 80th (Conservative) percentile of carbon intensities for this category.

envelope_specification.title: Envelope Specification
envelope_specification.description: 20th (Low Carbon), 50th (Best Practices), and 80th (Conservative) percentile of carbon intensities for this category.

interior_fitout_specification.title: Interior Fitout Specification
interior_fitout_specification.description: 20th (Low Carbon), 50th (Best Practices), and 80th (Conservative) percentile of carbon intensities for this category.

ref_charge_specification.title: Ref Charge Specification
ref_charge_specification.description: 20th (Low Carbon), 50th (Best Practices), and 80th (Conservative) percentile of carbon intensities for this category.

hardscape_specification.title: Hardscape Specification
hardscape_specification.description: 20th (Low Carbon), 50th (Best Practices), and 80th (Conservative) percentile of carbon intensities for this category.

grid_metric.title: Grid Metric
grid_metric.description: LRMER only available in USA. International default is AER.

FF_leakage_rate.title: Ff Leakage Rate
FF_leakage_rate.description: Upstream natural gas leakage as proportion of amount used on site.

FF_CI.title: Ff Ci
FF_CI.description: Average kgCO2e/kWh of fossil fuels burned on site.

COP.title: Cop
COP.description: The average coefficient of performance of the all-electric system.

grid_outlook.title: Grid Outlook
grid_outlook.description: `HighRE == SlowDecarb`; `Decarb == RapidDecarb`. `HighRE` and `Decarb` will be deprecated in a future release.

clean_power_purchase_amount.title: Clean Power Purchase Amount
clean_power_purchase_amount.description: Percentage of electricity use offset by the purchase of clean power.

efficiency_metric.title: Efficiency Metric
efficiency_metric.description: Unit: kW of nameplate capacity per active panel area.

onsite_solar_ground_coverage.title: Onsite Solar Ground Coverage
onsite_solar_ground_coverage.description: Proportion of total array area with active solar panels. Unitless.

custom_cladding.title: Custom Cladding
custom_cladding.description: Custom carbon intensity for opaque envelope. Units of kgCO2e/sf (default) of kgCO2e/m2.

custom_mep.title: Custom Mep
custom_mep.description: Custom carbon intensity for MEP systems. Units of kgCO2e/sf (default) of kgCO2e/m2

custom_glazing.title: Custom Glazing
custom_glazing.description: Custom carbon intensity for transparent envelope. Units of kgCO2e/sf (default) of kgCO2e/m2

custom_roofing.title: Custom Roofing
custom_roofing.description: Custom carbon intensity for roof assembly. Units of kgCO2e/sf (default) of kgCO2e/m2

custom_interior_fitout.title: Custom Interior Fitout
custom_interior_fitout.description: Custom carbon intensity for interior fitout. Units of kgCO2e/sf (default) of kgCO2e/m2

custom_A4_5.title: Custom A4 5
custom_A4_5.description: Custom carbon intensity for life cycle phases A4 and A5. Units of kgCO2e/sf (default) of kgCO2e/m2

custom_C1_4.title: Custom C1 4
custom_C1_4.description: UCustom carbon intensity for phases C1 to C4. Proportioned across categories.

custom_carbon_intensities.title: Custom Carbon Intensities
custom_carbon_intensities.description: Custom carbon intensity for building structural system. Units of kgCO2e/sf (default) of kgCO2e/m2

custom_hardscape.title: Custom Hardscape
custom_hardscape.description: Custom carbon intensity for hardscape assembly. Units of kgCO2e/sf (default) of kgCO2e/m2

custom_ref_ann_leakage.title: Custom Ref Ann Leakage
custom_ref_ann_leakage.description: Annual proportion of total refrigerant leaked annually.

custom_ref_eol_leakage.title: Custom Ref Eol Leakage
custom_ref_eol_leakage.description: Annual proportion of total refrigerant leaked during equipment end-of-life.

custom_ref_charge.title: Custom Ref Charge
custom_ref_charge.description: Total refrigerant change in kg. Always in kg.

custom_struct_bom.title: Custom Struct Bom
custom_struct_bom.description: Units: kg. Must pass full dict, even if some are None.

custom_struct_CI.title: Custom Struct Ci
custom_struct_CI.description: Units: kgCO2e/kg. Must pass full dict, even if some are None.

api_messages: The following outputs are always represented in SI units: emissions (kgCO2e), ac_annual (kW), nameplate_capacity (kWh), ref_charge (kg), structural_carbon_intensities (kgCO2e/kg), structural_quantities (metric tons).

start_year.title: Start Year
start_year.description: First year of custom grid emissions calculation.

start_kgCO2e_kWh.title: Start Kgco2E Kwh
start_kgCO2e_kWh.description: Carbon intensity of electricity in first year of custom grid emissions calculation. Not affected by unit_system parameter.

annual_factor.title: Annual Factor
annual_factor.description: Annual proportional change in grid emissions. I.e., a value of -0.05 is a 5% decrease each year after the first.

A1_3.title: A1 3
A1_3.description: Emissions from material extraction (A1), transport to manufacturing facility (A2), and manufacturing (A3).

B2_5.title: B2 5
B2_5.description: Emissions from maintenence (B2), repair (B3), replacement (B4), and refurbishment (B5).

C1_4.title: C1 4
C1_4.description: Emissions from end-of-life transportation (C2), processing (C3), and disposal (C4).

grid_outlook.title: Grid Outlook
grid_outlook.description: `HighRE == SlowDecarb`; `Decarb == RapidDecarb`. `HighRE` and `Decarb` will be deprecated in a future release.

grid_metric.title: Grid Metric
grid_metric.description: LRMER only available in USA. International default is AER.

clean_power_purchase_amount.title: Clean Power Purchase Amount
clean_power_purchase_amount.description: Percentage of electricity use offset by the purchase of clean power.

percent_conditioned_area.description: Percentage of the building GFA used in MEP and energy calculations.

FF_leakage_rate.description: Upstream natural gas leakage as proportion of amount used on site.

FF_CI.title: Ff Ci
FF_CI.description: Average kgCO2e/kWh of fossil fuels burned on site.

specification.title: Specification
specification.description: 20th (Low Carbon), 50th (Best Practices), and 80th (Conservative) percentile of carbon intensities for this category, or a custom carbon intensity (Units of kgCO2e/sf (default) of kgCO2e/m2).

above_floor_area.description: Average area per floor above grade.

below_floor_area.description: Average area per floor below grade.

window_to_wall_ratio.description: Proportion of glazing to total vertical envelope.

reduced_building_area.description: Reduction in building area. Large inputs can yield unrealistic results, as building geometry is not included in this calculation.

reuse.title: Reuse

percent_floor_area.description: Percentage of the building GFA used in interior fitout calculation.

specification.title: Specification
specification.description: 20th (Low Carbon), 50th (Best Practices), and 80th (Conservative) percentile of carbon intensities for this category, or a custom carbon intensity (Units of kgCO2e/sf (default) or kgCO2e/m2).

reuse.title: Reuse
reuse.description: Percentage reuse of existing structural system.

custom_carbon_intensities.title: Custom Carbon Intensities
custom_carbon_intensities.description: Custom carbon intensity for building structural system. Units of kgCO2e/sf (default) or kgCO2e/m2. Aliases from custom_structure.

custom_bom.title: Custom Bom
custom_bom.description: Units: kg. Must pass full dict, even if some are None.

concrete_specification.description: 20th (Low Carbon), 50th (Best Practices), and 80th (Conservative) percentile of carbon intensities for this category.

steel_specification.description: 20th (Low Carbon), 50th (Best Practices), and 80th (Conservative) percentile of carbon intensities for this category.

COP.title: Cop
COP.description: The average coefficient of performance of the all-electric system.

specification.description: Custom carbon intensity for MEP systems. Units of kgCO2e/sf (default) or kgCO2e/m2

reuse.title: Reuse
reuse.description: Percentage reuse of existing opaque envelope.

specification.title: Specification
specification.description: 20th (Low Carbon), 50th (Best Practices), and 80th (Conservative) percentile of carbon intensities for this category, or a custom carbon intensity (Units of kgCO2e/sf (default) or kgCO2e/m2).

GWP_specification.description: 20th (Low Carbon), 50th (Best Practices), and 80th (Conservative) percentile of carbon intensities for this category or custom GWP-100

charge_specification.title: Charge Specification
charge_specification.description: 20th (Low Carbon), 50th (Best Practices), and 80th (Conservative) percentile of carbon intensities for this category or total refrigerant change in kg. Always in kg.

ann_leakage.title: Ann Leakage
ann_leakage.description: Annual proportion of total refrigerant leaked annually.

eol_leakage.title: Eol Leakage
eol_leakage.description: Annual proportion of total refrigerant leaked during equipment end-of-life.

planted_area.title: Planted Area
planted_area.description: Area planted on site. Cannot exceed the difference between site area and building footprint.

site_area.title: Site Area
site_area.description: Total site area, including the building footprint.

additional_planting_area.title: Additional Planting Area
additional_planting_area.description: Planting area on and beyond the site. This parameter is not constrained by site area.

efficiency_metric.title: Efficiency Metric
efficiency_metric.description: Unit: kW of nameplate capacity per active panel area.

ground_coverage.title: Ground Coverage
ground_coverage.description: Proportion of total array area with active solar panels. Unitless.

specification.title: Specification
specification.description: 20th (Low Carbon), 50th (Best Practices), and 80th (Conservative) percentile of carbon intensities for this category or a custom carbon intensity for interior fitout. Units of kgCO2e/sf (default) or kgCO2e/m2.

total_sqf.title: Total Sqf
total_sqf.description: Gross floor area in square feet.

total_m2.title: Total M2
total_m2.description: Gross floor area in meters squared.

loseq_planting_area.title: Loseq Planting Area
loseq_planting_area.description: Total planting area with 'low sequestration' planting.

hiseq_planting_area.title: Hiseq Planting Area
hiseq_planting_area.description: Total planting area with 'high sequestration' planting.

benchmark_EUI.title: Benchmark Eui
benchmark_EUI.description: Benchmark energy use intensity. Units: kBtu/sf/yr of kWh/m2/yr.

onsite_ff_pc.title: Onsite Ff Pc
onsite_ff_pc.description: Proportion of annual energy use from onsite fossil fuel combustion.

ac_annual.title: Ac Annual
ac_annual.description: Total AC production of the on-site solar array. Units: kWh

total_array_area.title: Total Array Area
total_array_area.description: Total area of on-site solar array.

nameplate_capacity.title: Nameplate Capacity
nameplate_capacity.description: Nameplate capacity of on-site solar array in kW.

pv_pc_load.title: Pv Pc Load
pv_pc_load.description: Percent of building electricity demand generated by onsite PV.

av_seq.title: Av Seq
av_seq.description: Total embodied emissions from carbon storage in biogenic materials. Deprecated.

em_env.title: Em Env
em_env.description: Total embodied emissions from building envelope across all included life cycle stages.

em_syst.title: Em Syst
em_syst.description: Total embodied emissions from MEP and PV across all included life cycle stages.

em_site.title: Em Site
em_site.description: Total embodied emissions from sitework across all included life cycle stages.

em_struct.title: Em Struct
em_struct.description: Total embodied emissions from building structure across all included life cycle stages.

em_constr.title: Em Constr
em_constr.description: Emissions from transportation of materials to the construction site (A4) and construction (A5). Note that is model is farily coarse.

em_tfo.title: Em Tfo
em_tfo.description: Total embodied emissions from interiors across all included life cycle stages.

av_store.title: Av Store
av_store.description: Total carbon storage in landscape and planted roof.

av_pv.title: Av Pv
av_pv.description: Total avoided carbon from onsite PV. Life cycle module D.

av_biogenic.title: Av Biogenic
av_biogenic.description: Total carbon storage in biogenic materials. Life cycle module D.

av_site.title: Av Site
av_site.description: Total carbon storage in landscape. Life cycle module D.

op_ref.title: Op Ref
op_ref.description: Total carbon emissions from refrigerant leakage. Life cycle module D.

op_ff.title: Op Ff
op_ff.description: Total operational carbon emissions from onsite fossil fuel combustion.

op_elec.title: Op Elec
op_elec.description: Total operational carbon emissions from electricity use.

net_total.title: Net Total
net_total.description: Net total emissions, including all avoided carbon.

av_total.title: Av Total
av_total.description: Total avoided emissions. Life cycle module D.

kgCO2e_sf.title: Kgco2E Sf
kgCO2e_sf.description: Embodied carbon intensity per square foot GFA.

kgCO2e_m2.title: Kgco2E M2
kgCO2e_m2.description: Embodied carbon intensity per square meter GFA.

target_EUI.title: Target Eui
target_EUI.description: Target energy use intensity. When entered in a request, target EUI overrides benchmark EUI. Units: kBtu/sf/yr of kWh/m2/yr.

total_area.title: Total Area
total_area.description: Gross floor area in square feet.

building_footprint.title: Building Footprint
building_footprint.description: Equal to floor area per above ground floor.

roof_area.title: Roof Area
roof_area.description: Equal to floor area per above ground floor.

fitout_area.title: Fitout Area
fitout_area.description: Area used in all calculations of interiors emissions.

conditioned_area.title: Conditioned Area
conditioned_area.description: Area used in all calculations of energy use or MEP emissions.

total_pv_array_area.title: Total Pv Array Area
total_pv_array_area.description: Total area of on-site solar array.

loseq_planting_area.description: Total planting area with 'low sequestration' planting.

hiseq_planting_area.description: Total planting area with 'high sequestration' planting.

interior_fitout.title: Interior Fitout
interior_fitout.description: Carbon intensity of interiors in kgCO2e per unit area.

cladding.description: Carbon intensity of opaque envelope assembly in kgCO2e per unit area.

glazing.title: Glazing
glazing.description: Carbon intensity of transparent envelope assembly in kgCO2e per unit area.

roofing.title: Roofing
roofing.description: Carbon intensity of roofing assembly in kgCO2e per unit area.

mep.title: Mep
mep.description: Carbon intensity of MEP in kgCO2e per unit area.

Conc3_4kPSI.description: Carbon intensity of 3-4 kSI concrete in kgCO2e per kg.

WoodMassTimber.description: Carbon intensity of the engineered timber in kgCO2e/kg.
